Introduction
This topic contains general information about institutionalized, incompetent Veterans, including
notifying the fiduciary hub when a Veteran is admitted to a medical institution or transferred to another institution
, and
rating of incompetency subsequent to admission to a medical institution
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F - Awards Specific to Institutionalized, Incompetent Veterans
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F
